content: I get where you’re coming from in principle, but in practice this “advice”, the way it is pandered, and those that are pandering it are the equivalent of PowerBall winners extolling the virtues of investing in the lottery as sound financial advice. I don’t know about you, but I would consider that a pretty irresponsible thing to do. Out of curiosity, have any of those tactics worked for you? And if so, have you been able to successfully reproduce those results across multiple companies? Would be interested to hear about your experiences.
